mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pro p INNER JOIN breed b ON p.pro_idx = b.pro_idx INNER JOIN breedtype bt ON b.breedType_code = bt.breedType_code where member_idx=#{member_idx}

SELECT m.member_gender, m.member_dongAddr, p.pro_dogName, p.pro_dogAge, p.pro_dogGender, p.pro_dogDesc FROM member AS m INNER JOIN pro AS p ON m.member_idx = p.member_idx WHERE m.member_dongAddr = (SELECT member_dongAddr FROM member WHERE member_idx = #{param1}) AND p.pro_rep = 'Y' AND p.pro_idx IN ( SELECT pro_idx FROM `char` WHERE charType_code IN ( SELECT charType_code FROM `char` WHERE pro_idx = #{param2} ) GROUP BY pro_idx HAVING COUNT(*) = 4 ) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10
